comments: Joe (OKC) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Mathurin (IND) dislodges Williams (OKC) from his rebounding position, which affects his ability to pursue the loose ball.
Joe (OKC) and Smith (IND) engage and disengage in the post and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
Smith (IND) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
Smith (IND) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Smith (IND) brings his hands on Gilgeous-Alexander's (OKC) back and marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Dort (OKC) swipes down to make contact with the ball before following-through on McConnell's (IND) right arm, affecting the latter's driving shot attempt.
Joe (OKC) raises his arm into Smith's (IND) head, making more than marginal contact prior to Gilgeous-Alexander (OKC) dislodging the rebound away.
Smith (IND) is drawn toward Gilgeous-Alexander's (OKC) pump-fake and initiates contact with Gilgeous-Alexander's left arm that affects his upward shooting motion.
Dort (OKC) and McConnell (IND) come together on the perimeter and marginal contact occurs before McConnell's gather.
Giddey (OKC) and Smith (IND) mutually engage and disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Nwora (IND) legally contests Giddey's (OKC) driving shot attempt.

Smith (IND) deflects the loose ball away prior incidental follow-through contact occurring thereafter with Giddey's (OKC) head during the rebound. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Dort (OKC) and Nwora (IND) come together during the rebound and incidental foot to foot contact occurs that dislodges Nwora from his position.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Replay review of the OOB called on Dort (OKC) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. The ball last touches McConnell's (IND) left side before being ruled OOB.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Joe (OKC) steps OOB while in possession of the ball.
